text: "The Riverboat Song" is a 1996 song by British band Ocean Colour Scene. It was taken from their second studio album Moseley Shoals. It went to number 15 in the United Kingdom, number 13 in Scotland and number 37 in New Zealand where it was a moderate hit single there. ==Track listings== UK CD single # "The Riverboat Song" # "So Sad" # "Charlie Brown Says" UK 7-inch and cassette single # "The Riverboat Song" # "So Sad" ==References== Category:1996 songs
title: The Riverboat Song
